sentences.sentence: What would we call this now? This is entrapment.
Only death will break the fetters of this carefully devised entrapment.
sentences.translation: 只有到死，才能打破这一精心策划束缚。

sentences.sentence: It prevents water entrapment; water entrapped in the valve internals will accelerate corrosion.
sentences.translation: 防止水滞留。滞留在阀门内部构件的水会加速腐蚀。
